quest: Clark will not be able to attend the today’s meeting because ___________
a: he must to teach a class
b: he will be teaching a class
c: of he will teach a class
d: he will have teaching a class
explaination: because is followed by a subject and a verb according to the tense. Option B uses the present future continuous tense correctly.

quest: Florida relies heavily on income from fruit crops, and ___________
explaination: because is followed by a subject and a verb according to the tense. Option B uses the present future continuous tense correctly.

quest: Emily wanted to serve some coffee to her guests; however, ___________
c: there wasn’t a great amount of the sugar
d: she was lacking in amount of the sugar
explaination: Use much + noncount nouns. Option B uses many instead of much, options c and d have verbose or excessive use of words

quest: There has not been a great response to the sale, ___________
explaination: Penggunaan Tag Question, Klausa utama negatif, maka tag harus positif. Auxiliary yang digunakan has, dan subjek there tetap there pada tag

quest: ___________ is served in the restaurant has a smooth, creamy texture
explaination: Karena terdapat dua bentuk verb: is served dan has, maka keduanya butuh Subject. Subject untuk has adalah the cake, dan untuk is adalah that

quest: The gift which we selected for the bride were rather expensive
explaination: Seharusnya was. The gift merupakan singular subject, oleh karenanya verb nya harus mengikuti dalam bentuk singular

quest: We will have to return the merchandise purchase yesterday at the Broadway.
explaination: Seharusnya purchased. Purchased merupakan reduced adjective clause dari that is purchased.

Seharusnya did. Diatas merupakan bentuk inversion, auxiliary yang digunakan seharusnya mengikuti subjeknya, karena subjeknya singular maka auxiliarynya antara does/did, tetapi konteks kalimatnya menunjukkan bahwa hal itu sudah terjadi, maka yang tepat adalah past tense.
Seharusnya quickly. Yang dideskripsikan adalah verbnya, maka seharusnya menggunakan adverb. Quick merupakan adjective untuk mendeskripsikan noun.

quest: Federal taxes are year taxes which must be paid every April.
explaination: Seharusnya yearly. Untuk menjelaskan taxes harus digunakan bentuk adjective. Adjective dari year adalah yearly
